plain: Based on the user's favourite books, it can be inferred that their favourite genre is fantasy, their favourite kind of plot is character-driven, their favourite setting is a fictional world, their favourite writing style is descriptive and evocative, their favourite length is medium-length, their favourite topic is mythology and folklore, their favourite pacing is slow and methodical, their favourite narrative structure is third-person omniscient, and their favourite themes are identity, belonging, and the nature of good and evil. Additionally, it can be inferred that the user enjoys a mix of humour and darker, more introspective themes in their fiction.
